CustomField.description: If checked, user is confirming that the Sales Price entered (and other monetary value fields entered, if applicable) reflects the Opportunity Currency field value on the parent Opportunity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, user is confirming that the Sales Price entered (and other monetary value fields entered, if applicable) reflects the Opportunity Currency field value on the parent Opportunity.
CustomField.label: Sales Price reflects Opp. Currency
